positive_examples: This is an example of serotonin.
We observed serotonin in this context.
A typical case of serotonin would involve these features.
The concept of serotonin applies here.
A monoamine neurotransmitter that regulates mood, sleep, appetite, and various other physiological processes.
negative_examples: This is an example of dopamine, not serotonin.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Dopamine, or other types of Neurotransmitter

definition: A neurotransmitter regulating mood, sleep, appetite, and various cognitive functions.
